title: Lamamra receives UN Under-Secretary-General for Peace Operations
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community abroad, Ramtane Lamamra, received on Wednesday in Oran, the Under-Secretary-General of the United Nations in charge of peace operations, Jean-Pierre Lacroix.

The meeting, held on the sidelines of the 9th High Level Conference on Peace and Security in Africa, focused on developments at continental level and the prospects for strengthening cooperation between Algeria and the United Nations in the field of promoting peace and security on the African continent.
